sentences.en: a heart monitor
sentences.cn: 心脏监测仪

sentences.en: a monitor with a 21 inch screen
sentences.cn: 21英寸屏幕的显示器

sentences.en: A portable ambulatory ECG monitor is introduced in this paper.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍我们研制的便携式动态心电监护仪。

sentences.en: Fund managers are poorly placed to monitor firms.
sentences.cn: 基金管理人不适合监管公司。

sentences.en: He suspected that his phone calls were being monitored.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑他的电话被人监听。

sentences.en: He was elected monitor.
sentences.cn: 他当选为班长。

sentences.en: He was watching a game of tennis on a television monitor.
sentences.cn: 他在看电视转播的网球赛。

sentences.en: Let's see, our flight number is CX360 monitor says our flight is on time.
sentences.cn: 让我看看，我们的航班号是CX360，显示屏上显示我们的航班准时到了。

sentences.en: Most enzyme assays monitor disappearance of a product.
sentences.cn: 大多数酶的测量法是检测其底物的减少或产物的出现.

sentences.en: Patients who are given the new drug will be asked to monitor their progress.
sentences.cn: 使用这种新药的病人将被要求监测病情进展。

sentences.en: Philby was there to monitor any unforeseen developments on a daily basis.
sentences.cn: 菲尔比在那里每日不断地监视着那些预料不到的事态的发展.

sentences.en: She was staring at her computer monitor.
sentences.cn: 她注视着电脑显示屏。

sentences.en: The details of today's flights are displayed on the monitor.
sentences.cn: 今天航班的详细情况都列在显示屏上。

sentences.en: The government is monitoring the situation closely .
sentences.cn: 政府正密切关注着局势。

sentences.en: The heart monitor shows low levels of consciousness.
sentences.cn: 心脏监测器显示患者神志不清。

sentences.en: The new monitor apparatus is automatically controlled.
sentences.cn: 这套新的监护仪是自动控制的.

sentences.en: The patient was connected to the monitor.
sentences.cn: 病人被接上了监测器.

sentences.en: The temperature is carefully monitored .
sentences.cn: 温度受到仔细的监控。

sentences.en: The treadmill has a heart rate monitor.
sentences.cn: 跑步机上有个脉搏监视器.

sentences.en: UN monitors will remain in the country to supervise the elections.
sentences.cn: 联合国监督员将留在该国监督选举。

sentences.en: Watch the monitor and tell me if the level goes above forty decibels.
sentences.cn: 看着监测器,如果超过40分贝就告诉我.

sentences.en: We could watch what was happening on the TV monitor.
sentences.cn: 我们可在电视监视器上观察所发生的情况。

sentences.en: You must monitor the latest intelligence on armaments.
sentences.cn: 你们必须密切注意有关军备的最新情报.

sentences.en: Your doctor will monitor your blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 医生会监测你的血压。

phrases.tran_cn: 功率监控器，功率检查装置
遥控监视器；远距离监控装置

trans.tran_cn: 监测仪器，显示屏，班长，监督员，巨蜥
trans.tran_en: a television or part of a computer with a screen, on which you can see pictures or information
to carefully watch and check a situation in order to see how it changes over a period of time
to carefully watch and check a situation in order to see how it changes over a period of time
to carefully watch and check a situation in order to see how it changes over a period of time
